articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Ukraine
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Ukraine 
    Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was published in booklet by a publishing house of Ukraine on Oct. 5.
 The work published on Oct. 2, Juche 84 (1995) has served as a great immortal programme for party building and activities as it proudly reviewed the glorious history of the party which hewed a new path of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicated a way of developing the party into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung.

U.S. Ambition for War Disclosed
articles.content:
U.S. Ambition for War Disclosed 
    Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kwon Yong Gil, lawmaker from the south Korean Democratic Workers' Party, on October 10 reportedly disclosed the fact that the United States and the south Korean authorities agreed to revise and supplement the "OPLAN 5027".
 Opening to the public the "guidelines for the operation plan of the South Korea-U.S. Combined Forces Command" which had been worked out at the 34th "South Korea-U.S. annual consultative meeting on security," he disclosed that the main goal of the plan is "to wipe out the army of the north, remove its regime and create conditions for unifying the Korean Peninsula" and others and it calls for "revising and updating the existing the OPLAN 5027." 
 The stipulation that conditions shall be created for unifying the Korean Peninsula," in particular, hints at the launch of a war against the north by the forces of the United States and south Korea, he charged.    
 If it is true that the United States has no intention to attack or invade the north with nuclear and conventional weapons, the commitment made by it in the joint statement adopted at the fourth-round of the six-way talks, it should totally repeal all war scenarios against the north, he noted.
 Urging the United States to hold negotiations with the north to build a peace mechanism as early as possible as it had agreed to do so at the six-way talks, he declared that it is possible to ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula only when the U.S. rolls back its hostile policy towards the north and stop working out plans for a war of aggression and halt at once its military exercises under way according to them.

Kim Ki Nam Meets Delegation of WPM
articles.content:
Kim Ki Nam Meets Delegation of WPM
    Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Ki Nam met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico headed by Virgilio Maltos Long, member of the National Executive Committee of the WPM, on Friday. 
 The head of the delegation said that the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", a military parade and evening gala and torchlight procession celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea held in the presence of leader Kim Jong Il were splendid events that clearly testified to the organizing ability, indomitable revolutionary spirit and the spirit of defending the country fully displayed by the army and the people of the DPRK with profound reverence for their leader.

Kim Yong Nam Meets Families of Those Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Families of Those Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle
    Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a cordial and friendly conversation with families of Zhang Weihua, Chinese who was related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, Ri Jae Dok who was anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter in China, Feng Zhongyun, Zhou Baozhong and Wang Xiaoming, Chinese who were related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, Kim Son and Kim Sun Ok who were related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China, and Kim Chol who was anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr in China at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday. 
 They participated in the celebrations of the 60th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.    
 Present there were Song Yong Su, vice-director of the History Institute of the C. C., the WPK, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Receives Former President of Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Receives Former President of Indonesia
    Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, today received Former President of Indonesia Megawati Soekarnoputri, general chairwoman of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, and her party on a visit to the DPRK to congratulate the WPK on its 60th foundation anniversary.
 Present there were Kang Sok Ju, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Bambang Irawan Kromodimuljo, charge d' affaires ad interim of the Indonesian embassy here.    
 On the occasion Megawati congratulated Kim Jong Il on the 60th anniversary of the WPK and presented him with a gift prepared by her.
�@Kim Jong Il expressed thanks for this, warmly welcomed her visit to the DPRK and had a cordial and friendly talk with her.
